1.1.name: wordpress/thepath-tabbed-widget
1.1.description: Creates a tabbed area for RECENT, POPULAR and FEATURED posts. Saves space and doesnt bombard user with all your info at once. Uses JQUERY UI. Has its own CSS file so shouldnt conflict with your own sidebar stylings.
